entry.title: Polyester Short Sleeve Shirt - Blue
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type: FS
Price: 10.00

Polyester short sleeve tee shirts. These will work beautifully for sublimation or heat transfer vinyl. This is a unisex style.

93.5% Polyester, 6.5% Spandex

These fit true to size or generous.

180C degrees for 60 seconds

entry.title: The Rebel - Slouchy Off the Shoulder
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 25.00

You need this. We all need this! A gorgeous slouchy, off the shoulder long sleeve sweater. This is a lightweight french terry fabric. 

This is a limited boutique buy. We can't guarantee that these can be restocked. 

65% polyester 30% cotton 5% spandex

Available in size small to 3XL These fit true to size. Size up if you want a more slouch fit. Both models pictured wear size 8 and are wearing a medium.

entry.title: Cowl Neck Pullover
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type: BeFun
Price: 27.00

Boutique quality and North American sizing. Long sleeve with cowl neck hood. The cowl hood is lined in the same fabric as the sleeves. This pullover will become your new favourite. 

70% Polyester, 20% Cotton  5% Spandex

These fit true to size or generous fit.

Super soft, super flattering. Perfect for the holidays!

Long in the body.

Fabric content Green/White Stripe : 95% polyester 5% Spandex

Fabric content Red/White Stripe : 65% cotton 30% polyester 5% spandex

entry.title: CELEBRATION - Black with Green Plaid Sleeves
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 17.50

This is a limited edition item and when it is gone it is gone!

A very soft cotton shirt with the perfect amount of holiday plaid! Combine comfortable and fabulous. I have seen these with a large "CHEERS" in gold across the chest or get a little saucy with a "May contain Wine' 

Super soft, super flattering. Your new fave long sleeve t-shirt but this time with a little spicy plaid!

Long sleeve with ribbon tie cuff. Long in the body.

Fabric content :30% cotton ,65% polyester 5% Spandex

This shirt fits true to size or generous. Please refer to the size chart.
